hero.title: Logistics solutions without borders
hero.subtitle: Elite Cargo supports you with excellence in air freight, customs transit, and international moving since 1997.

about.title: Who are we?
about.text1: For over 20 years, Elite Cargo has specialized in air freight, international transit, and moving services. Thanks to our values of reactivity, rigor, and transparency, we offer customized support to all our partners.
about.text2: Our expertise is based on a strong network of subsidiaries in West Africa and a highly qualified team. We ensure each logistics step with seriousness, from pickup to delivery.

freight.title: Air Freight
freight.description: Complete freight management on major airlines with optimized tracking and security.

customs.title: Customs & Transit
customs.description: Customs formalities, import/export transit, specialized documentation on demand.

moving.title: Moving
moving.description: Complete solutions for professional and personal international relocations.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.desc: Respected deadlines and precise end-to-end tracking.

reactivity.title: Reactivity
reactivity.desc: A team available 7 days a week to support you.

network.title: Global Network
network.desc: International coverage thanks to our partners.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are at your disposal to answer all your questions and support you in your transport and logistics projects.

address.title: Address
address.value: Cargo Terminal of Gbessia Airport, Conakry (Republic of Guinea)
